children.subject: Flexible description strings in the menus

details.name: description
details.old_value:
Based on Kemon early design, give a refresh to the player HUD.

* Use of rounded chargebar (as an option), by implementing Bezier curves
* Implement skill charges, to quickly know when a weapon/skill can be used. We currently implement a colored chargbar, but this requires to switch to the according weapon to know its status.
* Implement a good alternative HUD using the current HUD code.
Unlike the design picture, keep the compass as it is very useful.

The info on screen should be displayed in a more minimalist way, to lessen distraction and ease focus on game.

Remove all unnecessary lines and/or colors for:
* Fireteam window
* Scoreboard
* Stats, Weapons stats and Objective windows
* Fireteam option menu
* In-game chat windows

Ensure consistency with the end of game debriefing screen.

Some early WIP screenshot attached.
